creditline: Gift of Elizabeth, Julie, and Catherine Andrus in memory of John and Marion Andrus
description: sketch of a battle scene; man sitting at center with his body twisted away from the viewer, leaning on ground over bayonet; reaching into bag on belt with PR hand; man carrying a wounded soldier at L, near a barefoot soldier who is carrying a flag; outlines of a running man at R; scribbles on back
title: Battle Sketch (Civil War)
